name: Fjanks security pages
description: A blog about security, CTF, vulnerabilities, pen-testing and other interesting things that are related to security. Mostly writeups from results of challenges, war-games, hacking into local vulnerable VMâ€™s and similar. I will try to make the writeups as realistic as possible by including all my wrong assumptions and failures. Also I will try to not include code complete walkthroughs, but leave the actual coding as an excercise to the reader.
